results.official_title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require employers to provide menstrual hygiene products for employees.
results.short_title: Menstrual Products for Employees Act

results.official_title: To establish the Commission on the Social Status of Black Men and Boys, to study and make recommendations to address social problems affecting Black men and boys.
results.short_title: Commission on the Social Status of Black Men and Boys Act

results.official_title: To delay for one year the release of the Overall Hospital Quality Star Ratings, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Hospital Quality Rating Transparency Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 to establish requirements relating to rent-to-own transactions, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Expanding Rent-to-Own Protections Act of 2016

results.official_title: Expressing support for designation of the week of October 30 through November 5, 2016, as "National Obesity Care Week".
To enhance whistleblower protection for contractor and grantee employees.
results.short_title: Whistleblower Protections for Contractors Act

results.official_title: To provide for the identification and prevention of improper payments and the identification of strategic sourcing opportunities by reviewing and analyzing the use of Federal agency charge cards.
results.short_title: Saving Federal Dollars Through Better Use of Government Purchase and Travel Cards Act of 2016

results.official_title: Making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2017

results.official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to eligible entities to train elementary and secondary school nurses on how to respond to a biological or chemical attack or an outbreak of pandemic illness in a school building or on school grounds.
results.short_title: School Protection Act of 2016

results.official_title: To establish requirements for participants in the peer-to-peer economy to be considered independent contractors and not employees for purposes of several employment-related statutes.
To repeal the Act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation".
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable credit for menstrual products.
results.short_title: Menstrual Products Tax Credit Act of 2016

results.official_title: To provide that members of the Armed Forces performing services in the Sinai Peninsula of Egypt shall be entitled to tax benefits in the same manner as if such services were performed in a combat zone.
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to improve the process by which the Social Security Administration makes disability determinations and awards disability benefits, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Preserving and Reforming SSDI (PAR-SSDI) Act of 2016

results.official_title: Encouraging the people of the United States to observe "National Lobster Day".
To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to change the permissible age variation in health insurance premium rates.
results.short_title: State Age Rating Flexibility Act of 2016

results.official_title: To reauthorize the diesel emissions reduction program.
results.short_title: Diesel Emissions Reduction Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to reduce waste, fraud, and abuse in the supplemental nutrition assistance program.
results.short_title: Food Stamp Integrity Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to require the label on certain menstrual products to include an ingredient list, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Accurate Labeling of Menstrual Products Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to require employers to provide menstrual hygiene products for employees in workplace bathrooms.
results.short_title: Menstrual Products for Employees Act of 2016

results.official_title: Making appropriations for the Department of State, foreign operations, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2017, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2017

results.official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the taxation of mead and certain low alcohol by volume wine.
results.short_title: Low Alcohol Wine Act

results.official_title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to establish the major metropolitan area counterterrorism training and exercise grant program, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Community Counterterrorism Preparedness Act

results.official_title: Recognizing the important role pollinators play in supporting ecosystems and economies.

Establishing the Joint Ad Hoc Committee on Trade Responsibilities to develop a plan under which the functions and responsibilities of the Office of the United States Trade Representative shall be moved to the legislative branch in accordance with article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United States, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Reclaiming Congress's Constitutional Mandate in Trade Resolution

results.official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that the Second Amendment of the Constitution of the United States protects the individual right to keep and bear arms for the purpose of self-defense and that the Second Amendment right is fully applicable to the States.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to make a quality education a civil right.

To amend the Securities Investor Protection Act of 1970 to confirm that a customer's net equity claim is based on the customer's last statement and that certain recoveries are prohibited, to provide the Securities and Exchange Commission with oversight of the Securities Investor Protection Corporation, and for other purposes.
To establish a National and Community Service Administration to carry out the national and volunteer service programs, to expand participation in such programs, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: ACTION for National Service Act

results.official_title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 511 East San Antonio Avenue in El Paso, Texas, as the "R.E. Thomason Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
To amend title 18, United States Code, to extend the coverage of the Federal prohibition against stalking in order to provide protection to friends and co-workers, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Expanded Stalking Protections Act of 2016

results.official_title: To authorize the Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative focusing on peace and nonviolence in global conflict resolution, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Gandhi-King Scholarly Exchange Initiative Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend section 287(g) of the Immigration and Nationality Act to make mandatory agreements under such section, to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to provide certain identity information to the National Criminal Information Center and the Law Enforcement Support Center, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Empowering Local Law Enforcement Act

results.official_title: To improve the ability of beginning farmers in the United States to acquire farms and participate in agricultural production, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Beginning Farmers Agenda Act of 2016

results.official_title: To establish a grant program to assist local educational agencies in improving student retention and engagement and providing resources and support to families of at-risk children, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Keep Students in School Act of 2016

results.official_title: To require the development of a national strategy to secure schools against terrorism nationwide, and ensure domestic preparedness for and the response to terrorism, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: National Strategy for School Security Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend title 38 and title 5, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs and other officials of the Department of Veterans Affairs to receive health care from the Department, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: PAVE Act of 2016

results.official_title: To make a categorical exclusion available to the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to develop and carry out a forest management activity on Federal lands to address insect or disease infestation declared as an emergency in a State by the Governor of such State, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Emergency Forest Restoration Act

results.official_title: To authorize the Attorney General to award grants to eligible entities to prevent or alleviate community violence by providing education, mentoring, and counseling services to children, adolescents, teachers, families, and community leaders on the principles and practice of nonviolence.
results.short_title: Securing American Families by Educating and Training You (SAFETY) Through Nonviolence Act of 2016

results.official_title: To provide for a land exchange involving certain National Forest System land in the State of South Dakota, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Spearfish Canyon and Bismarck Lake Land Exchange Act

results.official_title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to establish a program to provide additional incentives for the development of new drugs to treat pediatric cancers, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: RACE for Children Act

results.official_title: To create penalties for massage establishment owners and employees who fail to report knowledge or reasonable suspicion of sexual assault.
results.short_title: Duty to Report Sexual Assault Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 and the United States-Israel Strategic Partnership Act of 2014 to promote cooperative homeland security research and antiterrorism programs relating to cybersecurity, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: United States-Israel Advanced Research Partnership Act of 2016

results.official_title: To provide a requirement to improve data collection efforts.
results.short_title: LGBT Pride Act

results.official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to reaffirm the United States historic commitment to protecting refugees who are fleeing persecution or torture.
results.short_title: Refugee Protection Act of 2016

results.official_title: To provide a coordinated regional response to effectively manage the endemic violence and humanitarian crisis in El Salvador, Guatemala, and Honduras.
results.short_title: Secure the Northern Triangle Act

results.official_title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to establish a grant program to facilitate land acquisitions made to improve water quality, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Federal Partnership for Clean Water Land Acquisition Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish an excise tax on the production and importation of opioid pain relievers, and for other purposes.
results.short_title: Budgeting for Opioid Addiction Treatment Act

results.official_title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to include individuals participating in pre-apprenticeship programs offered by employers and provide that such employers may be reimbursed under such Act.
results.short_title: Apprenticeship Improvement Act of 2016

results.official_title: To amend the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to provide notice to State authorities when unaccompanied alien children are placed in that State.
results.short_title: Unaccompanied Alien Children Placement Transparency Act of 2016
